## Project Overview

The purpose of this project is to identify gene expression signatures from ovarian cancer RNA-seq data that are associated with a drug tolerant state that is characteristic of cancer persister cells.

1. [A summary of the data from Izar 2020 et al.](data_summary.html)
2. **PDX Data Analysis**
    a. [PDX Exploratory analysis](03.0_Izar2020_PDX_ExploratoryAnalysis.html)
    b. [PDX DE analysis](03.1_Izar2020_PDX_DEAnalysis.html)
    c. [PDX Cell Cycle analysis](03.2_Izar2020_PDX_CellCycleAnalysis.html)
3. **SS2 Data Analysis**
